summary: Baton Rouge is the capital city of Louisiana, located on the Mississippi River. With a population of 227,470 (as of 2020), it's part of the state's second-largest metro area. Historically important due to its location on the Istrouma Bluff, it's safe from flooding and has a strong levee system. Baton Rouge has been ruled by seven nations and is now a major industrial, medical, and technological center. It's home to Louisiana State University and Southern University. The city has a diverse culture, influenced by European immigrants and African peoples, and practices various religious traditions.
title: Baton Rouge, Louisiana
